CSSPrimitiveValueSetFloatValue.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The setFloatValue() method of the
interface is used to set a float value. If the property
attached to this value can't accept the specified unit or the float value, the value
will be unchanged and a will be raised.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:
